name: Default Theme
author: Aaron Horeth
description: This is the default theme, it consists of a dark page background color with a lighter diff region.
main: #main {position: absolute; top: 0; bottom: 0; left: 0; right: 0; padding: 10px;}
diffHeader: #diffHeader {position: absolute; top: 0; bottom: 0; left: 0; right: 0; padding: 10px;}
diffBody: #diffContainer {clear: left; float: left; width: 100%; overflow-x: scroll;}
#col1 {float: left; width: 46%; position: relative; left: 52%; overflow-x: scroll;}
#col2 {float: left; width: 46%; position: relative; left: 52%; overflow-x: scroll;}
